Russia was paying $10 million a quarter to Uipath to spread propaganda against the West via bots. So, its a very good thing that they stopped this toxic relationship. Now, the interest rates hikes. This should not affect so much because 1) we have zero debt, and 2) if other companies suffer because of rate hikes and the whole economy goes to recession, bots will be a part of the solution to keep running. This software is so good that it will win regardless of the scenario. That is why I still see this company as the most valuable company in the whole world.
